Question
========
What is the recommended approach when using AI tools on confidential data?

Answerlist
----------
* Upload the data to a public AI service to get faster results
* Use AI only on synthetic or anonymized data, or avoid uploading sensitive data
* Assume all AI providers delete data immediately
* Share the data only after the analysis is complete

Solution
========
The unit emphasizes avoiding exposure of confidential data by using synthetic/anonymized data or keeping data local.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
